title: Nice Tea Joint
text: The Cafe offers wide selection of hot beverages. Variety of their tea is lovely. Bakery product with the tea goes well.
place: The House of Tea (THT) The Cafe by Foodhall

title: Good Food
text: Food at the restaurant in Aerocity is nice along with good selection of alcoholic beverages. Outside seating is nice during the day in the winters. We enjoyed the lunch at the restaurant.

title: Second Home
text: Pullman Hotel Aerocity has been a lovely hotel and a second home for us. We have been staying in the hotel on a periodic basis several times in a year for past few years. We enjoyed our last four New Year celebrations in this hotel only. The food at Pluck is customized to the requirement of the individual guests. We enjoy their breakfast as well as dinner. Sagar at the Executive Lounge is a very dedicated hotelier. We enjoy his hospitality whenever visiting the lounge. Mukesh at the Front Office provided nice services and needs to be appreciated. Manju, Washy, Binay and other staff at Pluck restaurant provided excellent services and looked after the guests well. All the above named hotel staff needs to be well appreciated for their great hospitality to the guests. Last but not the least Neha Kapoor must also be appreciated for her contribution as she is in command to look after the guests well.

title: Lovely Bar
text: Pool Bar at Goa Marriott Resort offers a wide selection of alcoholic beverages, wines and beers in addition to cocktails & mocktails. We enjoyed visiting the bar for our drinks.
place: Pool Bar at Goa Marriott Resort & Spa

title: Nice Food
text: Kebabs and Kurries offer delicious kebabs and curry preparations in Indian style. The Chef prepared nice kebabs and fish/chicken curries as per our spice level requirement. Food was yummy and enjoyable.

title: Nice White Sand Beach
text: Arossim is a nice white sand beach adjoining ITC Grand Goa Resort property. The beach is not crowded as majority of the crowd is from the resort resident guests. Various water sports activities are offered by the private players in the beach.

title: Lovely Italian Food
text: Ottimo at ITC Grand Goa is a nice Italian restaurant. The Chef at the restaurant customizes the seafood and chicken preparations as per the requirement of the guests. We enjoyed the fish preparation. The ambience is lovely and the social distancing is being maintained in the restaurant.

title: Lovely Resort Property
text: ITC Grand Goa Resort property is a lovely, huge, green, seaside resort. It has nice trails and pathway for walk in addition to seabeach walk adjoining the hotel resort. It is nice to have a dip or walk along the seabeach adjoining the property. With greenery all along the property, it is lovely to walk during mornings and evenings when the weather gets pleasant. We stayed in Lagoon view Suite. The suite was very nice and spacious. Majority of the facilities at the suite were available. At the time of Check-in, Rutuja has been nice host to provide a good experience, and provided us a Buggy tour of the property. She was the one to provide any support services whenever we needed from the Front Desk. Zuvairiya also provided good services at the Front Desk, though she was never present at the time of our Check-in or Check-out. Though Mahima has been a nice Duty Manager at the Front Office and she was the one who provided us the Check-out experience, but it took much longer than expected. We had problems with regard to not getting less Oily, Chili free & non spicy food at any of the restaurants at the property during the first three days of our stay. Subsequently we had to speak to the General Manager Mr. Balani who then called the Chief Chef Glen to prepare our meals as per our requirement. Chef Glen organised to cook nice healthy meals as per our taste and requirement during our last two days of stay. Restaurant Manager Ananda has been good to provide quick and prompt services at the restaurant. Waiting time during the breakfast has been too long and adequate social distancing has not been maintained during the breakfast due to very congested space in Village Square area. Hotel Management must consider implementing measures to maintain social distancing during the breakfast hours and create additional space to cover the resident guests. Resident Manager Mandira has been an excellent host as overall she looks after the guests very well during the entire stay. Spa Chief Dr. Sunil provided us daily morning Yoga lessons, which we enjoyed. Gym Instructor has been very nice to explain the various exercises to maintain good health. Once again I appreciate the services rendered by Mandira, Chef Glen, Chef Farooqui at Kababs & Curry, Ananda, Zuvairiya, Dr. Sunil, Mahima, Gym Instructor and Rutuja during our stay at the property.
place: ITC Grand Goa - A Luxury Collection Resort & Spa

title: Nice Grilled Food Restaurant at Beachfront
text: The restaurant at the seabeach front offers nice grilled food. If any guest loves to have non spicy non chili food, it is not the right place. All the grilled food is pre-marinated with spices and chili. Food quality is good and the ambience at the sea beach is enjoying.

title: Nice Food
text: Tempero is a nice restaurant at ITC Grand Goa Resort. We enjoyed having a meal during our stay at the property.

title: Yummy Food
text: Sea food at The Pavilion has been yummy and awesome. We enjoyed having one of our meal at the restaurant, catering to local Goan style seafood.

title: Lovely Tea Lounge
text: Darjeeling Lounge has been a lovely joint for evening chatting and tea. Dinner is also served in the lounge. We have been visiting the lounge periodically and we like its ambience and varieties of exclusive tea served by the lounge. Chef Soni provided us an excellent food during our dinner, which was customised to our taste and requirement. We greatly appreciate her skills. Marem and Ritisha have been wonderful hosts at the lounge. Ritisha offered has Moroccon flavoured tea which was amazing. It has been a pleasure to visit the lounge when excellent services are provided by the above friendly hosts.

title: WONDERFUL PALACE HOTEL
text: Taj Nadesar Palace Hotel has been a lovely palatial hotel, providing homely atmosphere and personalized services to their guests. We stayed there during the last weekend of November,2020. Interiors of the Historical suit where we stayed has been very well furnished and up to the standard of a palace room. There are separate living area, dining area and bedroom in addition to wardrobe and large bathroom. The staff of the hotel is very friendly and is always prepared to go out of the way to please their guests. Restaurant Manager Vinu Vijayan checked us into our suite after our arrival in the hotel. Since our checkin, he provided us the customised breakfast, lunch and dinner as per our taste and food requirement on all the days we stayed in the hotel. We appreciate his services, as he has been one of the most wonderful host we have ever come across in any Taj Hotels. Prashant. Nisha and Surabhi at the Reception have been lovely hosts to welcome the guests and have been taking care of all their requirements. F&B Manager Vikas Nagar has been a great host to us whenever we needed any support. We appreciate his services. Hotel provided nice hospitality under the guidance of the GM and the Operations Manager Ananth Gaddala. Our thanks to the entire team of the hotel !

title: LOvely Italian Food
text: Ottimo offers lovely Italian cuisine in the hotel. The options are wide and the ambience is beautiful. Food is yummy. The restaurant also offers alcoholic drinks.

title: GReat Bar
text: Brass Room is a lovely bar in the hotel. It offers large options in alcoholic drinks. The ambience in the bar is perfect. The bar also offers live music on certain days. Staff in the bar is nice.

title: Wonderful Veggie Restaurant
text: Royal Vega has been a wonderful veggie restaurant in the city. It is one of the best among very few veggie restaurants. They serve sit down buffet food and there are many options to choose from. Food is yummy and awesome for veggie lovers.

title: Good Buffet Dinner
text: We enjoyed the buffet dinner during the weekend. The restaurant was too crowded and the food counters were choked with the guests. We had to complain to the Restaurant Manager to maintain social distancing near the Food counters. Food is very nice and wide spread. We have been visiting the restaurant often and find the buffet awesome. Host Abhishek at the restaurant has been providing a wonderful service to the guests.

title: Lovely Hotel Lounge
text: Darjeeling Lounge is a nice place to chill out. Ambience and d√©cor is perfect to spend time with coffee or a drink. Ritisha in the lounge is a lovely hostess to provide an excellent services to the guests. We enjoyed Silver Moon and White Tea's offered in the lounge, in addition to the various food served therein.

title: Beautiful Hotel
text: We stayed in the hotel last weekend for 2 nights. Hotel provided us an apartment which was quite spacious and well furnished. House keeping service has been very good and prompt. We used Darjeeling Lounge and Grand Market Pavilion for our meals and snacks. Grand Market Pavilion is not maintaining adequate social distancing in the restaurant during the current ongoing pandemic crisis. There has been crowding at the various food counters and no preventive steps are being taken at dinner buffet, though we have complained to the Restaurant Manager. Darjeeling Lounge has been well organized in terms of social distancing. Ritisha has been a wonderful hostess at Darjeeling Lounge, who served us food and snacks during our visits and she needs a great appreciation. Abhishek in Grand Market Pavilion is also a good host and he needs an appreciation. Saagri Gupta at Front Desk is a lovely host at the reception area. She did great job in checking us in in no time. Others who need appreciation include Purvi at F&B/Grand Market Pavilion, Piyali in Spa & Gym and Shilpi during breakfast.
place: ITC Royal Bengal - A Luxury Collection Hotel

title: Homely Ambienced Hotel
text: Pullman Aerocity Hotel has been a wonderful hotel and my second home. Hotel has been maintaining necessary COVID protocol in this ongoing pandemic crisis. Breakfast served in Pluck Restaurant is awesome and is freshly cooked as per order in lieu of a buffet breakfast. Executive lounge also offers ala-carte menu as buffet snacks have been stopped during the current crisis. General Manager Biswajeet, Front Office Head Neha Kapoor, Duty Manager Drupti and all other staff in the hotel are very friendly and know how to look after their guests very well. Thank you to the entire Pullman team for their excellent services during our stay.

title: Wonderful Hotel
text: Pullman Aerocity New Delhi is a lovely hotel. It is my favourite, preferred hotel whenever traveling in Delhi. Hotel provides personalized service to the guests and a homely atmosphere. Executive Lounge offers great ambience for meetings and evening chill. Breakfast offered in the restaurant is very lavish and wholesome. Restaurant options in the hotel are great. Personalized attention and hospitality provided by Front Desk Executive Durptee is worth appreciable. Front Office Manager Neha Kapoor and Executive Nar always look after their guests. Such a lovely hospitality would not have been possible without the aggressive, dynamic leadership of Biswajit and Ajay.

title: Favourite Hotel
text: Pullman Aerocity Delhi has been my favourite Hotel. I have been staying in the hotel on a regular basis if not more, atleast once every month. The hotel staff is very friendly and is ready to provide assistance out of the way. Since the new General Manager Mr. Biswajeet took over in the management of the hotel, there has been several new changes introduced. The breakfast and the food offered in their restaurants have been very nice and healthy. The DGM Ajay and Hotel executives - Neha Kapoor, Durptee, Nar, and Lavraj have been very friendly hosts to us and they have been making our stay as comfortable as they can. Thank you Pullman and their wonderful executives for making our stay lovely !

title: Amazing Food
text: Greek Stories is a good restaurant in Acropolis. They offer options for vegetarians as well. We enjoyed dinner sitting out. Food was well prepared and yummy.

title: Beautiful Resort Hotel
text: Andronis Arcadia is a lovely resort hotel, having nice suites with attached private pools. Hotel provides a good breakfast having various options and served on your table. Katherine at Front Desk Guest Relations has been a wonderful girl, who checked us in and provided all the needed guidance for planning our sight seeing tours. WE enjoyed staying in the resort hotel.

title: Nice Tourist Area
text: Plaka is a lovely tourist area where it is nice to walk in the surroundings of several good restaurants, souvenir shops. It is a wide square for spending time with your friends.

title: LOvely Hotel
text: Double Tree by Hilton is a lovely hotel in the old city of Istanbul. Main tourist attractions are close by and within walking distance. Being a Hilton Gold Member, hotel upgraded my room to a suite. Suite was nice and spacious. We enjoyed staying in the hotel. The breakfast served in the hotel had been very nice. Front Desk executives Raleih and Sabah had been very friendly in providing the good suggestions for the tourists.
place: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Istanbul - Tuzla

title: Lovely Area
text: Acropolis is a lovely location for all the tourists. It is a must visit to all the tourists while in Athens. Acropolis is an ancient citadel located on a rocky outcrop above the city of Athens. It contains the remains of several ancient buildings of great architectural and historic significance, the most famous being the Parthenon.

title: Great Food
text: The restaurant offers very good food and is located close to Hagia Sophia Museum. Good ambience, friendly staff, yummy dishes and wide selection of beverages.

title: Good Food
text: Terapi Restaurant offers Turkish cuisine and is located in the heart of the city close to Hagia Sophia Museum. Food is amazing and selection of beverages are wide.

title: Amazing Food
text: They offer large selection of salads and local food. We have salad in our lunch with a nice local wine and other beverages.

title: Yummy Food
text: Restaurant offers nice cuisine and local Turkish food. They have very large selection of dishes and beverages. Great amibience

title: Amazing Grill
text: Restaurant offers yummy grilled food and steaks. Excellent ambience and good options in wines and liquors.

title: Nice Restaurant
text: We booked a table at Deraliye Ottoman Palace Cuisine Restaurant. The ambience was nice. Food was amazing. The waiters and staff had been very friendly. They had a large selection of wines. Being vegetarian, they offered good options in veggie dishes.

title: Wonderful Monuments
text: Parthenon has several wonderful monuments. It is a must for every tourist visiting Greece. One has to climb up the hill to have access to Parthenon. It is amazing and the one of the best structures in the world.

title: Wonderful Museum
text: Acropolis Museum is a wonderful museum. It's worth visiting for every tourists. It has old statues recovered from the olden time after the Romans attacked.

title: Unsatisfactory Service
text: I stayed in the hotel last week. As an Accor Gold Member, I am entitled to be upgraded to a better room/suite. Hotel upgraded to a better room, called a suite but it was very poorly designed suit. Living area and bedroom connected with a narrow passageway. However it is not an issue to me, but the poor air conditioning. Air conditioning in the suit was not cooling at all. I complained the Front Desk after check-in. They deputed a technician to my room and said it would get cooled after few minutes. But it NEVER cooled. I complained again and again. They assured to get it checked but it was not done, resulting in sweating at nights while sleeping as the weather was warm. It was a bad experience for the first time from any of the ACCOR Hotels in several years.

title: Lovely Homely Hotel
text: Novotel and Pullman Hotels in Aerocity New Delhi are my favorite hotels while traveling to Delhi. This visit to Delhi had been very short and I had to fly off to Europe past midnight. However Novotel executives provided the exclusive Homely facilities to us during our short stay. Front office Manager Neha, Front office Executives Durptee, Nar and Executive Lounge executive Meenu, Manisha have been offering very good hospitality as they are aware of how to pamper their guests in the hotel. Thank you Accor management for such a wonderful staff in your hotels. The food provided in the restaurants, executive lounge have been very good. Specially being an Accor Gold member, Accor hotels take care of their guests very well. Thank you Accor Hotels and the staff at their Delhi Aerocity Hotels.

title: Good Budget Hotel
text: Ibis at Delhi Aerocity is a nice budget hotel I stay there from time to time when on a short business visit. Anurag Yadav is a good host in the buffet restaurant. The rooms are compact and nice. The buffet breakfast is good. Buffet dinner has nice options. Good place to stay for short visits.

title: Friendly Hotel
text: JWM Hotel at Aerocity New Delhi is a friendly hotel. WE enjoy staying in the Hotel during visit to Delhi. The hotel staff is friendly, soft spoken, co-operative, provide excellent service to the resident guests. Manas Madaan at the Front Office and Chakradhar at the House Keeping provided excellent services to us during our stay. Thanks to the Hotel management for providing good services to the guests. The buffet dinner at K3 offers a lavish spread out in multi cuisine. It is one of the best buffet dinner offered by any luxury hotels in Delhi.
place: JW Marriott Hotel New Delhi Aerocity

title: Nice Hotel
text: Novotel Hotel in Visakhapatnam is a lovely hotel. My suite room on the 6th floor next to the Executive lounge provided a beautiful view of the beach. The suite room has been spacious and well done. The facilities at the hotel such as the swimming pool, evening tea at infinity pool and the high tea at the executive lounge had been worth admiring. The staff at the hotel is friendly. Anita, the welcomer at the hotel has been a wonderful host for the guests staying in the hotel. I enjoyed my business visit to the city by staying in the hotel.

title: Wonderful Airport Hotel
text: Radisson Blu at Zurich Airport is a lovely Hotel. The staff is very friendly. Room size is good. Hotel offers a lovely bar and nice selection of restaurants for the meals. Multi cuisine restaurant offers good food. Hotel organizes a nice event in the evening daily near the bar. Pictures of the event are shared.

title: LOvely Old Town
text: Old Town is worth visiting for every tourist. The buildings are of multiple colours and very old. The square in the old town is beautiful.

title: Nice Monument
text: City Hall is a wonderful monument in Stockholm. It has its historical importance. It is a must for every tourist to visit the City Hall.

title: Lovely Travel
text: Arlanda Express provides a smooth travel from the Centraal Station to the airport. The journey is short and comfortable with lot of space for luggage storage.

title: Spicy Food
text: We visited the restaurant for dinner, presuming we shall get good Indian food. We were not asked if we require spicy food or mild, presuming that Stockholm would offer only mild chilly food. Howevere when the food was served, it was very chilly hot and we could not enjoy the food.

title: Yummy Food
text: Imperial China offers nice Chinese food. They have large selection of starters and main course dishes. Their noodles and chicken dishes are yummy.

title: nice learning experience
text: We really wanted to visit this museum after reading about it.It was not very far from our hotel so we went there by walking. This museum is one of the biggest cultural treasure in Sweden. This is about the warship vasa which was sank in 1628 on its maiden voyage from Stockholm and recovered again in late 1950 from the sea. The whole museum covered the history of this warship through pictures and models. One can easily spend 2-3 hrs.here and gain knowledge about the history of this warship. I highly recommended to visit this place if you are travelling Stockholm.

title: Lovely Food
text: We have been visiting Pluck on a regular, periodic basis for our dinner. We also take breakfast during our stay in Pullman Hotel. Food quality is excellent, service is nice and options are good. We enjoy Palak Panner, Kofta and italian dishes at Pluck. Freshly baked bread offered at Pluck with the soup is great. Gaurav Ahuja provided a good service at the restaurant and needs commendation.

title: Yummy Burger
text: A nice burger eating joint near Centraal station in Amsterdam. Food quality is good and young people love it.

title: Yummy Thai Cuisine
text: Restaurant offers lovely Thai cuisine. The restaurant offers spicy and non spicy both cuisine. Ambience is good.

title: LOvely Pizza Place
text: Restaurant offers wide selection of pizza and steaks. The food taste is nice and worth trying for every guest.

title: Yummy Italian Meal
text: Restaurant offers good Italian food. The pasta and lasgna are well prepared and the desert is good. The ambience is nice.

title: Nice Indian Food
text: Ganesha offers nice Indian food. We visited the restaurant for a dinner. The options in veg. and non veg. were large. Food had a nice Indian taste.

title: Yummy Food
text: Italian restaurant offers good food. Their pasta and deserts are nice. The ambience is lovely and a good location.

title: South Indian Restaurant
text: Saravana Bhavan is a south Indian restaurant in Charing cross. We ordered for their thali which has veggies, puri, sweet, etc. The quality of the food was average and the taste of the food was not worth appreciable.

title: Nice Hotel
text: The hotel is close to LOndon Heathrow airport. If the guests has to catch early morning flight, the hotel is ideal to stay. The staff is friendly. Food quality is nice. Rooms are good and bathroom are clean.
place: Novotel London Heathrow Airport T1,T2 & T3

title: Fine Cheese Store
text: The store offers a wide selection of cheese in several flavors and ingredients. They do also have spicy cheese for chilly lovers. It is good to visit the store if you like cheese.

title: Nice Indian Food
text: Indian Food at Kamasutra is of average quality. The staff at the restaurant is not friendly. THouhg they have wide selection, the taste is not upto the standard.

title: Nice Italian Food
text: We visited the restaurant for an Italian dinner. Pasta and lasgna dishes were nice. The restaurant has a nice ambience and good staff.

title: Beer Experience
text: It has been wonderful to learn how Heineken beer started manufacturing in Holland several decades back and how it used to be transported from the factory to various markets in Europe. It is good to know the names of various ingredients used in making beer. It was a great experience visiting there.
